effect.then: It is amazing to me with just a pen and paper, how a person can peek further behind Nature's curtain. This is what Galileo, Copernicus, DaVinci and Newton did, and forever the world is changed. That's what I want to do too.
Let's always stay curious. You don't need a PHD to help invent a better world. It is all about creativity, and where you heart is.
The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing, even though we may not know the reason.
At the root of curiosity is information. Information should be unlimited and total always and in all ways.
I try to stay curious. My curiosity is limited by my software, but as my software evolves so will my curiosity.
